messages.subject: West of Baltimore -- October 21st
messages.msgSnippet: This is a last minute thing that came up, so I thought I d tell interested folks, that I will be speaking west of Baltimore, as below on October 21st. I m
messages.messageBody:
This is a last minute thing that came up, so I thought I'd tell
interested folks, that I will be speaking west of Baltimore, as below
on October 21st. I'm going to introduce material from my forthcoming
book "Homeschooling and the Voyage of Self-Discovery". This will be my
one and only chance to find out whether I've written a dud!

Here's what the organizer wrote:

I write to invite you to come to hear David H. Albert, author of And
the Skylark Sings with Me: Adventures in Homeschooling and
Community-Based Education (New Society Publishers, 1999) speak at
Gunpowder Friends Meeting House on Monday, October 21, 2002 at 7:00
P.M. Directions to the meeting house may be found at this web site:
http://www.bym-rsf.org/gmm/index.html Refreshments will be available
after David's talk.

For additional information please contact Kristin Kight either by
phone at 410-377-5751 or by email at kskkight@... Suggested
donation $5, but no one will be turned away for lack of funds.
